_description: The Eyes belie the Mouth (associated with Charles d’Orléans) — three 7-line stanzas and 4-line Envoy

BLHar682.First Lines:
Alas madame what maner strijfIs ther bitwene yowre mouth and
                    y…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…Me thynkith it thrillith me and slethSaue that yowre eyen
                    mercy seith
